description: Fire and smoke rose from Beirut’s southern suburbs, which have been the focus of Israeli airstrikes. The IDF says the area contains Hezbollah targets.
title: Live updates: Airstrikes pound Beirut suburbs as Israel expands attacks across Lebanon

description: Gaza’s road to reconstruction, whenever calm returns, will be a monumental process experts say will involve humanitarian needs, clearing rubble and rebuilding.
title: Israel has bombed much of Gaza to rubble. What will it take to rebuild?

description: Israel is racking up military wins against its regional foes. But fighting multiple wars will take its toll, and experts wonder what the long-term strategy is.
title: Israel has momentum in its battle with Hezbollah. But what comes next?

description: Tens of thousands climb Mount Hoverla every year. During the war, it has become a pilgrimage for those seeking to lay down their grief and sorrow for a few hours.
title: No air raid sirens on Ukraine’s tallest mountain, just the promise of a future

description: French President Emmanuel Macron’s call comes as the war in Gaza grinds on and Israel’s conflict with Hezbollah escalates farther into Lebanon.
title: Macron urges countries to ‘stop delivering weapons’ to Israel for war in Gaza
